opportunities.title: Prospective City Team Owner (Founding League Tier)
opportunities.subtitle: Explore becoming a founding patron of the first generation of professional Classical Latin & Greek Music League teams in your city.
opportunities.meta: Indicative support: $25,000/year • Keywords: team owner, patron, governance, historic founding role.

opportunities.title: Consular Patron — Curated Salons & Introductions
opportunities.subtitle: Underwrite early League and Conservatory operations while hosting unhurried salons, classical dinners, and curated introductions with other high-level contributors.
opportunities.meta: Indicative support: $5,000/month • Keywords: patron, salons, introductions, founding circle.

opportunities.title: Cohort Runner & Scholar (Founding Cohort)
opportunities.subtitle: Commit to a regular running-recitation practice, help test early training formats, and support the first generation of youth scholars who will study and perform.
opportunities.meta: Indicative support: time & presence • Keywords: running, study, recitation, founding cohort.

opportunities.title: Home Studio / Practice Space Contributor
opportunities.subtitle: Share a reliable space where small groups can rehearse, study, or refine performances that will shape the League’s founding seasons.
opportunities.meta: Indicative support: space & schedule • Keywords: rehearsal, conservatory, local infrastructure.

opportunities.title: Volunteer Host & Introduction Broker (Running Events)
opportunities.subtitle: Help host and welcome runners and guests at early Picketly events. Your hospitality and introductions help define what the League’s founding years feel like.
opportunities.meta: Indicative support: regular volunteer shifts • Keywords: hosting, introductions, promise brokerage, character in action.
